home.title: Hire experts or be hired for any job, any time

employer.heading1: Is your candidate selection process taking too long?
employer.heading1Content: Save time in screening CVs and pre-qualifying interviews. Compare profiles, find missing skillset, match on relevancy. We serve you what is needed as a platter.
employer.heading2: Craft your Requirement. Get perfect Matches.
employer.heading2Content: SAP World offers a way to completely save time in screening the required candidature. Post your Requirements effortlessly, find exact matching candidates, make data-driven screening decisions and compare profiles of applied SAP candidates for picking the right fit.
employer.heading3: SAP Recruiting is easy. Get the Perfect Match Candidature
employer.heading3Content: A platform perfectly crafted for SAP Recruiters. Get instant matches to your must-have and good-to-have skillset. Make accurate decisions by comparing similar pattern profiles.
employer.heading4: Screening and choosing the Right Profile without any hassles
employer.heading4Content: Look and compare every detail of the requirement and skill set you are looking for in a potential talent. View perfectly matching skillset, missing skills as well as “good to have'' skill sets
employer.register: You have made the right decision. You are just a step away from hiring the best potential talent. Fill in and move forward

user.title: Looking for a job in SAP?
user.title2: is something special waiting for you!
user.heading1: Plan your SAP career in the right place
Plan your SAP career in the right place
user.heading1Subject: Where Potential Talent Gets Great Opportunities!
user.heading1Content: Are you interested in furthering your career in SAP, and curious as to what suitable jobs are out there for you? SAP World can help you with the right career opportunities with exclusive search criteria-based job opportunities. It is not just one among the other job portals trying to find opportunities for you that may or may not be a right fit. Know how? Watch the video.
user.heading: SAP World Jobseeker
user.heading2: Find the Right Job. Right Now
user.heading2Content: Make a personalized search exclusively picked for your candidature. Get perfect Job Requirement that matches your skillset and apply for them. An exclusive Job Portal for SAP profiles that helps you get you the right job based on your hands-on skill set.
user.heading3Content: A Fully Completed profile gives you a higher percentage of potential opportunities. Keep your profile information up to date to ensure the recruiters knock up to you for great fit opportunities.
user.heading4Content: Job recommendations based on match score between your resume content and our job database. You are given the exact and nearest matches to compare and choose from. Jobs are recommended based on real-time job Description.
user.register: You are one step away from a potential opportunity that’s waiting for you. Fill in the required information and get started!

fotgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
fotgotPassword.content1: Not to worry. Just fill in your email address. We shall send you a link to reset your password
fotgotPassword.message: Great. We shot you an email with a link for resetting your account password. Check your inbox.

homePage.title: Employer
homePage.content1: An hassle-free SAP talent finding platform. Make your hiring decisions faster and easier
homePage.content2: Make your career move with confidence. A Job Portal built on advice of SAP domain experts
Make your career move with confidence. A Job Portal built on advice of SAP domain experts
homePage.content3: We have brought candidates closer to them. From start-ups to SMEs and large corporations, we ensure we scrutinize and shortlist the right candidate they were longing for.
homePage.content5: Find jobs, create a search -friendly profile and enrich your applications. Here is how we can help you with getting your dream job!
homePage.content7: You are viewed based on must-have and good to have skillsets.
homePage.content9: Compare the opportunities and pick what suits your candidature.
homePage.content10: Know matching opportunities, availability, pick what suits you the best.
homePage.content12: Manage your profile with what you want to show online and whatnot.
homePage.content14: Looking for something more? Let’s talk. We’d love to hear from you. Write to us and our executive shall stay in touch.

postJob.title: Help us serve you better!
postJob.content: A half-completed profile is a missed opportunity. Please ensure you fill out your details completely
postJob.contentSubject: to fit in the search criteria your potential employer is looking for!
